OfxParamTypeDouble.name: periodicRadius
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Radius of the trajectory of periodic motion.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: periodicFrequencyUnit
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Unit of Speed.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: periodicFrequencyBeat
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Beat Type.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: periodicSkip
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Number of steps of periodic motion you want to skip.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER.name: periodicN
OfxParamTypeINTEGER.OfxParamPropHint: Point/Side numbers of polygon of the trajectory of periodic motion. 1 is a circle, 2 is a two-point line, and 3 or more is a polygon.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER.name: periodicInterval
OfxParamTypeINTEGER.OfxParamPropHint: Point interval of the trajectory of periodic motion.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: periodicBend
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Bend of the trajectory of periodic motion.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: periodicRotate
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Rotation of the trajectory of periodic motion, in degrees.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: periodicDeform
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Deformation of the trajectory of periodic motion.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: periodicCurve
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Motion Curve Type.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: periodicSymmetry
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: It allows the two adjacent motion curves to be symmetric.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: functionRoundTrip
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Enable Round-Trip or not.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: functionCurve
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Motion Curve Type.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: functionSymmetry
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: It allows the two adjacent motion curves to be symmetric.

OfxParamTypeDouble2D.name: translate
OfxParamTypeDouble2D.OfxParamPropHint: Translation along the x and y axes. Can also be adjusted by clicking and dragging the center handle in the Viewer.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: rotate
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Rotation angle in degrees around the Center. Can also be adjusted by clicking and dragging the rotation bar in the Viewer.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: faceToCenter
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: It allows the moving object to automatically face to the center.

OfxParamTypeDouble2D.name: scale
OfxParamTypeDouble2D.OfxParamPropHint: Scale factor along the x and y axes.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: flop
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Mirror image (swap left and right).

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: flip
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Upside-down (swap top and bottom).

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: uniform
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Use the X scale for both directions.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: skewOrder
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: The order in which skew transforms are applied: X then Y, or Y then X.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: transformAmount
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Amount of transform to apply. 0 means the transform is identity, 1 means to apply the full transform.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: invert
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Invert the transform.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: filter
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Filtering algorithm - some filters may produce values outside of the initial range (*) or modify the values even if there is no movement (+).
Impulse: (nearest neighbor / box) Use original values. Box: Integrate the source image over the bounding box of the back-transformed pixel. Bilinear: (tent / triangle) Bilinear interpolation between original values. Cubic: (cubic spline) Some smoothing. Keys: (Catmull-Rom / Hermite spline) Some smoothing, plus minor sharpening (*). Simon: Some smoothing, plus medium sharpening (*). Rifman: Some smoothing, plus significant sharpening (*). Mitchell: Some smoothing, plus blurring to hide pixelation (*)(+). Parzen: (cubic B-spline) Greatest smoothing of all filters (+). Notch: Flat smoothing (which tends to hide moire' patterns) (+).

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: clamp
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Clamp filter output within the original range - useful to avoid negative values in mattes.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: motionBlur
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Quality of motion blur rendering. 0 disables motion blur, 1 is a good value. Increasing this slows down rendering.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: directionalBlur
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Motion blur is computed from the original image to the transformed image, each parameter being interpolated linearly. The motionBlur parameter must be set to a nonzero value.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: shutter
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Controls how long (in frames) the shutter should remain open.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: shutterOffset
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Controls when the shutter should be open/closed. Ignored if there is no motion blur (i.e. shutter=0 or motionBlur=0).
Centered: Centers the shutter around the frame (from t-shutter/2 to t+shutter/2). Start: Open the shutter at the frame (from t to t+shutter). End: Close the shutter at the frame (from t-shutter to t). Custom: Open the shutter at t+shuttercustomoffset (from t+shuttercustomoffset to t+shuttercustomoffset+shutter).

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: shutterCustomOffset
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: When custom is selected, the shutter is open at current time plus this offset (in frames). Ignored if there is no motion blur (i.e. shutter=0 or motionBlur=0).

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: mix
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Mix factor between the original and the transformed image.

OfxResourceSet.OfxPropPluginDescription: Allows an image to fit another in translation, rotation and scale.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: enable1
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Enables the point on the bottom left.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: enable2
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Enables the point on the bottom right.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: enable3
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Enables the point on the top left.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: enable4
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Enables the point on the top right.

OfxParamTypePushButton.name: copyFrom
OfxParamTypePushButton.OfxParamPropHint: Copy the contents (including animation) of the "from" points to the "to" points.

OfxParamTypePushButton.name: copyFromSingle
OfxParamTypePushButton.OfxParamPropHint: Copy the current values of the "from" points to the "to" points.

OfxParamTypePushButton.name: setToInputRod
OfxParamTypePushButton.OfxParamPropHint: Copy the values from the source region of definition into the "from" points.

OfxParamTypePushButton.name: copyTo
OfxParamTypePushButton.OfxParamPropHint: Copy the contents (including animation) of the "to" points to the "from" points.

OfxParamTypePushButton.name: copyToSingle
OfxParamTypePushButton.OfxParamPropHint: Copy the current values of the "to" points to the "from" points.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: transformAmount
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Amount of transform to apply (excluding the extra matrix, which is always applied). 0 means the transform is identity, 1 means to apply the full transform. Intermediate transforms are computed by linear interpolation between the 'from' and the 'to' points.

OfxParamTypeGroup.name: transformMatrix
OfxParamTypeGroup.OfxParamPropHint: This matrix gets concatenated to the transform defined by the other parameters.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: overlayPoints
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Whether to display the "from" or the "to" points in the overlay.
To: Display the "to" points. From: Display the "from" points.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: invert
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Invert the transform.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: filter
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Filtering algorithm - some filters may produce values outside of the initial range (*) or modify the values even if there is no movement (+).
Impulse: (nearest neighbor / box) Use original values. Box: Integrate the source image over the bounding box of the back-transformed pixel. Bilinear: (tent / triangle) Bilinear interpolation between original values. Cubic: (cubic spline) Some smoothing. Keys: (Catmull-Rom / Hermite spline) Some smoothing, plus minor sharpening (*). Simon: Some smoothing, plus medium sharpening (*). Rifman: Some smoothing, plus significant sharpening (*). Mitchell: Some smoothing, plus blurring to hide pixelation (*)(+). Parzen: (cubic B-spline) Greatest smoothing of all filters (+). Notch: Flat smoothing (which tends to hide moire' patterns) (+).

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: clamp
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Clamp filter output within the original range - useful to avoid negative values in mattes.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: motionBlur
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Quality of motion blur rendering. 0 disables motion blur, 1 is a good value. Increasing this slows down rendering.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: directionalBlur
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Motion blur is computed from the original image to the transformed image, each parameter being interpolated linearly. The motionBlur parameter must be set to a nonzero value.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: shutter
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Controls how long (in frames) the shutter should remain open.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: shutterOffset
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Controls when the shutter should be open/closed. Ignored if there is no motion blur (i.e. shutter=0 or motionBlur=0).
Centered: Centers the shutter around the frame (from t-shutter/2 to t+shutter/2). Start: Open the shutter at the frame (from t to t+shutter). End: Close the shutter at the frame (from t-shutter to t). Custom: Open the shutter at t+shuttercustomoffset (from t+shuttercustomoffset to t+shuttercustomoffset+shutter).

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: shutterCustomOffset
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: When custom is selected, the shutter is open at current time plus this offset (in frames). Ignored if there is no motion blur (i.e. shutter=0 or motionBlur=0).

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: mix
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Mix factor between the original and the transformed image.

OfxResourceSet.OfxPropPluginDescription: Translate an image by an integer number of pixels.

OfxParamTypeDouble2D.name: translate
OfxParamTypeDouble2D.OfxParamPropHint: New position of the bottom-left pixel. Rounded to the closest pixel.

OfxResourceSet.OfxPropPluginDescription: Read individual frames from a sprite sheet.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.name: spriteSize
OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.OfxParamPropHint: Size in pixels of an individual sprite.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.name: spriteRange
OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.OfxParamPropHint: Index of the first and last sprite in the animation. The sprite index starts at zero.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER.name: frameOffset
OfxParamTypeINTEGER.OfxParamPropHint: Output frame number for the first sprite as a whole.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER.name: frameSeparation
OfxParamTypeINTEGER.OfxParamPropHint: The separation of the frames, based on the frame rate of the project.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: readingDirection
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
The reading direction of the sprites.
Horizontal Forward: Read the sprites in a horizontal forward direction. Horizontal Backward: Read the sprites in a horizontal backward direction. Vertical Forward: Read the sprites in a vertical forward direction. Vertical Backward: Read the sprites in a vertical backward direction. Horizontal Forward(S-shaped): Read the sprites in a horizontal forward S-shape direction. Horizontal Backward(S-shaped): Read the sprites in a horizontal backward S-shape direction. Vertical Forward(S-shaped): Read the sprites in a vertical forward S-shape direction. Vertical Backward(S-shaped): Read the sprites in a vertical backward S-shape direction.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: playbackMode
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
The playback mode when playing the sprites.
Normal: Play the sprites in Normal mode. Normal & Reverse: Play the sprites in Normal & Reverse mode. Normal & Reverse (Merge): Play the sprites in Normal & Reverse mode, with repeated first/last frames being merged into one frame.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER.name: loopOffset
OfxParamTypeINTEGER.OfxParamPropHint: Output frame number for the first sprite in a single loop.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.name: repeatRange
OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.OfxParamPropHint: Delimit a range within which the sprites will be repeated several times. When the Repeat Count is 0, no repeat is performed.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER.name: repeatCount
OfxParamTypeINTEGER.OfxParamPropHint: Delimit a range within which the sprites will be repeated several times. When the Repeat Count is 0, no repeat is performed.

OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.name: spritesCut
OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.OfxParamPropHint: Cut the sprite sheet and read it separately.

OfxResourceSet.OfxPropPluginDescription: This effect applies a transform that corresponds to projection the source image onto a 3D card in space.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: axisImportFormat
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
The format of the file to import.
chan: Chan format, each line is FRAME TX TY TZ RX RY RZ VFOV. Can be created using Natron, Nuke, 3D-Equalizer, Maya and other 3D tracking software. Be careful that the rotation order must be exactly the same when exporting and importing the chan file. Boujou: Boujou text export. In Boujou, after finishing the track and solving. Each camera line is R(0,0) R(0,1) R(0,2) R(1,0) R(1,1) R(1,2) R(2,0) R(2,1) R(2,2) Tx Ty Tz F(mm).

OfxParamTypeString.name: axisImportFile
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Import a chan file created using 3D tracking software, or a txt file created using Boujou.

OfxParamTypeString.name: axisExportChan
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Export a .chan file which can be used in Natron, Nuke or 3D tracking software, such as 3D-Equalizer, Maya, or Boujou. Be careful that the rotation order must be exactly the same when exporting and importing the chan file.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: axisXformOrder
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Order in which scale (S), rotation (R) and translation (T) are applied.
SRT: Scale, Rotation, Translation. STR: Scale, Translation, Rotation. RST: Rotation, Scale, Translation. RTS: Rotation, Translation, Scale. TSR: Translation, Scale, Rotation. TRS: Translation, Rotation, Scale.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: axisRotOrder
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Order in which Euler angles are applied in the rotation.
XYZ: Rotation over X axis, then Y and Z. XZY: Rotation over X axis, then Z and Y. YXZ: Rotation over Y axis, then X and Z. YZX: Rotation over Y axis, then Z and X. ZXY: Rotation over Z axis, then X and Y. ZYX: Rotation over Z axis, then Y and X.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: axisUniformScale
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Scale factor over all axis. It is multiplied by the scale factor over each axis.

OfxParamTypeDouble3D.name: axisSkew
OfxParamTypeDouble3D.OfxParamPropHint: Skew over each axis, in degrees.

OfxParamTypeDouble3D.name: axisPivot
OfxParamTypeDouble3D.OfxParamPropHint: The position of the origin for position, scaling, skewing, and rotation.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: axisUseMatrix
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Check to specify manually all the values for the position matrix.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: camEnable
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Enable the camera projection parameters.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: camImportFormat
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
The format of the file to import.
chan: Chan format, each line is FRAME TX TY TZ RX RY RZ VFOV. Can be created using Natron, Nuke, 3D-Equalizer, Maya and other 3D tracking software. Be careful that the rotation order must be exactly the same when exporting and importing the chan file. Boujou: Boujou text export. In Boujou, after finishing the track and solving. Each camera line is R(0,0) R(0,1) R(0,2) R(1,0) R(1,1) R(1,2) R(2,0) R(2,1) R(2,2) Tx Ty Tz F(mm).

OfxParamTypeString.name: camImportFile
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Import a chan file created using 3D tracking software, or a txt file created using Boujou.

OfxParamTypeString.name: camExportChan
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Export a .chan file which can be used in Natron, Nuke or 3D tracking software, such as 3D-Equalizer, Maya, or Boujou. Be careful that the rotation order must be exactly the same when exporting and importing the chan file.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: camXformOrder
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Order in which scale (S), rotation (R) and translation (T) are applied.
SRT: Scale, Rotation, Translation. STR: Scale, Translation, Rotation. RST: Rotation, Scale, Translation. RTS: Rotation, Translation, Scale. TSR: Translation, Scale, Rotation. TRS: Translation, Rotation, Scale.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: camRotOrder
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Order in which Euler angles are applied in the rotation.
XYZ: Rotation over X axis, then Y and Z. XZY: Rotation over X axis, then Z and Y. YXZ: Rotation over Y axis, then X and Z. YZX: Rotation over Y axis, then Z and X. ZXY: Rotation over Z axis, then X and Y. ZYX: Rotation over Z axis, then Y and X.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: camUniformScale
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Scale factor over all axis. It is multiplied by the scale factor over each axis.

OfxParamTypeDouble3D.name: camSkew
OfxParamTypeDouble3D.OfxParamPropHint: Skew over each axis, in degrees.

OfxParamTypeDouble3D.name: camPivot
OfxParamTypeDouble3D.OfxParamPropHint: The position of the origin for position, scaling, skewing, and rotation.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: camUseMatrix
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Check to specify manually all the values for the position matrix.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: camfocal
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The camera focal length, in arbitrary units (usually either millimeters or 35 mm equivalent focal length). haperture and vaperture must be expressed in the same units.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: camhaperture
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The camera horizontal aperture (or film back width), in the same units as the focal length.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: camvaperture
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The camera vertical aperture (or film back height), in the same units as the focal length.

OfxParamTypeDouble2D.name: camwin_translate
OfxParamTypeDouble2D.OfxParamPropHint: The camera window (or film back) is translated by this fraction of the horizontal aperture, without changing the position of the camera center. This can be used to model tilt-shift or perspective-control lens.

OfxParamTypeDouble2D.name: camwin_scale
OfxParamTypeDouble2D.OfxParamPropHint: Scale the camera window (or film back).

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: camwinroll
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Rotation (in degrees) of the camera window (or film back) around the z axis.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: cardImportFormat
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
The format of the file to import.
chan: Chan format, each line is FRAME TX TY TZ RX RY RZ VFOV. Can be created using Natron, Nuke, 3D-Equalizer, Maya and other 3D tracking software. Be careful that the rotation order must be exactly the same when exporting and importing the chan file. Boujou: Boujou text export. In Boujou, after finishing the track and solving. Each camera line is R(0,0) R(0,1) R(0,2) R(1,0) R(1,1) R(1,2) R(2,0) R(2,1) R(2,2) Tx Ty Tz F(mm).

OfxParamTypeString.name: cardImportFile
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Import a chan file created using 3D tracking software, or a txt file created using Boujou.

OfxParamTypeString.name: cardExportChan
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Export a .chan file which can be used in Natron, Nuke or 3D tracking software, such as 3D-Equalizer, Maya, or Boujou. Be careful that the rotation order must be exactly the same when exporting and importing the chan file.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: cardXformOrder
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Order in which scale (S), rotation (R) and translation (T) are applied.
SRT: Scale, Rotation, Translation. STR: Scale, Translation, Rotation. RST: Rotation, Scale, Translation. RTS: Rotation, Translation, Scale. TSR: Translation, Scale, Rotation. TRS: Translation, Rotation, Scale.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: cardRotOrder
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Order in which Euler angles are applied in the rotation.
XYZ: Rotation over X axis, then Y and Z. XZY: Rotation over X axis, then Z and Y. YXZ: Rotation over Y axis, then X and Z. YZX: Rotation over Y axis, then Z and X. ZXY: Rotation over Z axis, then X and Y. ZYX: Rotation over Z axis, then Y and X.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: cardUniformScale
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Scale factor over all axis. It is multiplied by the scale factor over each axis.

OfxParamTypeDouble3D.name: cardSkew
OfxParamTypeDouble3D.OfxParamPropHint: Skew over each axis, in degrees.

OfxParamTypeDouble3D.name: cardPivot
OfxParamTypeDouble3D.OfxParamPropHint: The position of the origin for position, scaling, skewing, and rotation.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: cardUseMatrix
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Check to specify manually all the values for the position matrix.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: lensInFocal
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The focal length of the camera that took the picture on the card. The card is scaled so that at distance 1 (which is the default card Z) it occupies the field of view corresponding to lensInFocal and lensInHAperture.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: lensInHAperture
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The horizontal aperture (or sensor/film back width) of the camera that took the picture on the card. The card is scaled so that at distance 1 (which is the default card Z) it occupies the field of view corresponding to lensInFocal and lensInHAperture.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: format
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Desired format for the output sequence.
Format: Use a pre-defined image format. Size: Use a specific extent (size and offset). Project: Use the project extent (size and offset).

OfxParamTypePushButton.name: recenter
OfxParamTypePushButton.OfxParamPropHint: Centers the region of definition to the input region of definition. If there is no input, then the region of definition is centered to the project window.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: NatronParamFormatChoice
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: The output format

OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.name: NatronParamFormatSize
OfxParamTypeINTEGER2D.OfxParamPropHint: The output dimensions of the image in pixels.

OfxParamTypeDouble2D.name: bottomLeft
OfxParamTypeDouble2D.OfxParamPropHint: Coordinates of the bottom left corner of the rectangle.

OfxParamTypeDouble2D.name: size
OfxParamTypeDouble2D.OfxParamPropHint: Width and height of the rectangle.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: invert
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Invert the transform.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: filter
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Filtering algorithm - some filters may produce values outside of the initial range (*) or modify the values even if there is no movement (+).
Impulse: (nearest neighbor / box) Use original values. Box: Integrate the source image over the bounding box of the back-transformed pixel. Bilinear: (tent / triangle) Bilinear interpolation between original values. Cubic: (cubic spline) Some smoothing. Keys: (Catmull-Rom / Hermite spline) Some smoothing, plus minor sharpening (*). Simon: Some smoothing, plus medium sharpening (*). Rifman: Some smoothing, plus significant sharpening (*). Mitchell: Some smoothing, plus blurring to hide pixelation (*)(+). Parzen: (cubic B-spline) Greatest smoothing of all filters (+). Notch: Flat smoothing (which tends to hide moire' patterns) (+).

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: clamp
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Clamp filter output within the original range - useful to avoid negative values in mattes.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: motionBlur
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Quality of motion blur rendering. 0 disables motion blur, 1 is a good value. Increasing this slows down rendering.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: directionalBlur
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Motion blur is computed from the original image to the transformed image, each parameter being interpolated linearly. The motionBlur parameter must be set to a nonzero value.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: shutter
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Controls how long (in frames) the shutter should remain open.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: shutterOffset
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint:
Controls when the shutter should be open/closed. Ignored if there is no motion blur (i.e. shutter=0 or motionBlur=0).
Centered: Centers the shutter around the frame (from t-shutter/2 to t+shutter/2). Start: Open the shutter at the frame (from t to t+shutter). End: Close the shutter at the frame (from t-shutter to t). Custom: Open the shutter at t+shuttercustomoffset (from t+shuttercustomoffset to t+shuttercustomoffset+shutter).

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: shutterCustomOffset
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: When custom is selected, the shutter is open at current time plus this offset (in frames). Ignored if there is no motion blur (i.e. shutter=0 or motionBlur=0).
